mechanics.trigger: When a creature is targeted by Feather Fall while falling
mechanics.condition: Creature is one of up to five falling creatures within range when spell is cast
mechanics.outcome: Creature's rate of descent slows to 60 feet per round until the spell ends

mechanics.condition: Feather Fall is active on the creature AND creature lands before the spell ends
Feather Fall is active on the creature AND creature lands before the spell ends
mechanics.outcome: Creature can land on its feet

mechanics.condition: Feather Fall is active on the creature AND creature lands before the spell ends
mechanics.outcome: Feather Fall spell ends for that specific creature

description_text: Choose up to five falling creatures within range. A falling creature's rate of descent slows to 60 feet per round until the spell ends. If the creature lands before the spell ends, it takes no falling damage and can land on its feet, and the spell ends for that creature.
